headline: Is It Too Late To Consider McDonald's (MCD) After Its Steady Five-Year Share Price Run?
summary: Wondering if McDonald's at around US$302 a share still offers value, or if most of the upside is already priced in? This article is going to unpack what the current market price might be implying. The stock has been relatively steady recently, with a 7.1% return over the past year and a 60.4% return over five years. Shorter term moves include a 1.7% decline over 7 days and a 2.7% decline over 30 days, and year to date it is close to flat at a 0.2% decline. Recent headlines have focused on...
